snippet: Drone strikes by the United States have violated Pakistan’s sovereignty and disrupted life in the country’s tribal areas, Ben Emmerson, a United Nations human rights investigator, said.
abstract: United Nations human rights investigator Ben Emmerson says United States has violated Pakistan's sovereignty and disrupted life in country's tribal areas with drone strikes in its counterterrorism operations near border with Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: Drone strikes by the United States have violated Pakistan’s sovereignty and disrupted life in the country’s tribal areas, Ben Emmerson, a United Nations human rights investigator, said.

headline.seo: U.N. Official Denounces U.S. Drone Use in Pakistan
headline.main: U.N. Official Says U.S. Drones Breach Pakistan’s Sovereignty
headline.print_headline: U.N. Official Says U.S. Drones Breach Pakistan’s Sovereignty
